text: (O pravakta!) Niscayanga, memu nuh ku mariyu atani tarvata vaccina pravaktalaku sandesam (vahi) pampinatlu, niku kuda sandesam pampamu. Mariyu memu ibrahim, ismayil, is hakh, ya'akhub laku mariyu atani santati variki mariyu isa, ayyub, yunus, harun mariyu sulaiman laku kuda divyajnanam (vahi) pampamu. Mariyu memu davud ku jabur granthanni prasadincamu
